title: Personal opinion: Lee Sin's R stun needs to wear off faster
body:
His RQ combo should not be guaranteed.

For the posterboy "high skill" champ this is one of the most low skill interactions in the game.

Did you know when Lee ults you, you get rooted until the animation finishes? That's something like a 0.1 second root but just imagine if {{champion:18}} or{{champion:67}} had a root on their knockbacks, making them impossible to reposition. If anything needs to go, it's the damn root. When I play {{champion:122}} , it denies my ult (roots deny my ult).

I get the Darius ult frustration but comparing Lee Sin's knockback to Tristana's and Vayne's is just ridiculous. You know they both do their knockbacks at range, right? Lee Sin has to get into melee range to do his (yes I know that's not exactly the hardest thing for him to do) and that alone puts him at risk purely because right in the face of the enemy is one of the most dangerous places you can be.
Yes I know but it's still hard cc which is never mentioned. Considering it's hard cc it should be mentioned somewhere and not be hidden power. And as long as it denies the guillotine it's a problem.
